About Me

and where I've been...

BIO

An avid communicator and versatile worker, with experience ranging from marketing, communication, event planning and web development to lifeguarding, swim coaching and community service. An expected graduation in Spring 2022 with a bachelor’s degree focused in Organizational Communications, and a Minor focused in Entrepreneurship and Innovation, from Michigan State University. Currently working towards becoming a full-stack MERN web developer! Novice in HTML CSS & Java, API's. Developing skills in MySQL, databases, React, Node express & Mongo DB.

University of Michigan HR Communications

Head Intern

Interned for the communications team in the human resources division at the University of Michigan. Participated in meetings that involved big event planning and creatives for staff communication campaigns. Covered multiple staff events with video, audio, & photo support. Wrote articles and took pictures for the University’s staff human resources website and The University Record, the official source for faculty-staff news at the University of Michigan. Assisted graphic designer with infographic layouts.

University Club @ Michigan State University

Head Lifeguard

Head Lifeguard at the University Club of MSU. Responsible for all other guards on duty,Participated in weekly CPR, water rescue, and emergency action training. Daily responsibilities also included pool maintenance, facility cleaning,assisting patrons, and filing diligent incident reports

Center for Spartan Engineering

Marketing and Events Intern

Marketing and Event Planning Intern at The Center for the College of Engineering at Michigan State University. Assisted with social media communications and content generation. Supported the Marketing Specialist to create and implement a marketing plan focused on student engagement and career exploration for Michigan State Engineers using the following resources: •Newsletter •Social Media (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Website) •Canva: social media post design tool •Physical Marketing: flyers, posters, signage
